statements: UPDATE SustainableFashionEvents SET event_name='Eco-Fashion Expo', event_location='City Center', organizer_name='GreenStyle Co.' WHERE event_id=1;
UPDATE SustainableFashionEvents SET event_name='Eco-Friendly Runway', event_date='2022-09-15', organizer_name='EcoChic Events', event_location='Green Park' WHERE event_id=2;
UPDATE SustainableFashionEvents SET event_location = 'New York City' WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE SustainableFashionEvents SET organizer_name = 'Green Fashion Group', event_name = 'Eco Fashion Show' WHERE event_id = 2;
UPDATE participants SET participant_name = 'Alice', email = 'alice@example.com' WHERE participant_id = 1;
UPDATE outcomes SET outcome_description = 'Successful' WHERE participant_id = 2 AND event_id = 1001;
UPDATE participants SET participant_name='John Doe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE participant_id=1;
UPDATE outcomes SET outcome_description='Won the first place' WHERE participant_id=2 AND event_id=1;
UPDATE sustainable_fashion_events SET participants_count = 150 WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE participant_tracking SET participation_status = 'Confirmed' WHERE participant_id = 3;
UPDATE sustainable_fashion_events SET participants_count = participants_count + 1, outcome_description = 'Increased participation' WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE campaign_outcomes SET outcome_type = 'Positive Impact', outcome_description = 'Significant increase in awareness' WHERE campaign_id = 2;
UPDATE event_participants SET outcome='Successful' WHERE event_id=1
UPDATE participants SET phone_number='123-456-7890' WHERE participant_id=10
UPDATE event_participants SET participation_date='2022-01-03' WHERE event_id=101 AND participant_id=201;
UPDATE outcomes SET success=TRUE, feedback='Great job!' WHERE event_id=102 AND participant_id=202;
UPDATE event_participants SET attended = TRUE WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE campaigns SET goal = 'Increase engagement' WHERE campaign_id = 3;
UPDATE event_participants SET attended = TRUE WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE events SET organizer_name = 'John Doe', location = 'New York' WHERE event_id = 201;
